courses.description: This course introduces a community relations system with proven techniques and practices for effective sustainability outreach programs and provides both non-traditional and pathway students the opportunity to develop a skill-set in the field of sustainability.

notes: Above section 7080 meets for 12 weeks, Sep 03 to Nov 19, and is a hybrid class taught on campus and online via the Internet. For additional information, go to smc.edu/OnlineEd.
